verses.verse: O <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, all ye <S%H1471>nations<s%>; <S%H7623>Laud<s%> <S%H1471>him<s%>, all ye peoples.
For his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H1396>great<s%> toward <S%H571>us<s%>; And the truth of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
